tasks.task: Perform the first pass identification of potential LaTeX formula structures as defined in the latex_verification_process.xml file.
For each identified potential formula, perform the second pass verification against the strict criteria.
Analyze the context surrounding each potential formula to ensure accurate classification.
For verified formulas, ensure you capture the full LaTeX code, including all commands and syntax.
If no structures meet the criteria for a LaTeX formula after the two-pass verification, respond ONLY with the not_found_response as specified.
